content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a new message with an update to the "write_to_file" command. The message suggests using the Selenium WebDriver library to automate interactions with the game's web interface. The command was successfully executed and the file was written to successfully.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "league_of_legends_bot_pyautogui.txt", "text": "We can use the PyAutoGUI library to simulate mouse and keyboard input to control the game."}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
